column1: Little Goat Diner////The shrimp & pork belly noodles have fideos noodles
column2: which is a Spanish noodle similar to a spaghetti or angel hair pasta. You get chunks of crispy pork belly
column5: all tossed in a tamarind vinaigrette. The tamarind is very potent
column6: but not overpowering. The pork belly is crispy and tender
column7: and the shrimp is excellent. The noodles are a bit past al dente
